extends AnnotationContainer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Author

        public Author(String key,
              String displayName,
              String authorName,
              String authorEmail,
              AnnotationContainer.Hierarchy hierarchy)
        Creates a new instance of Author.
        Parameters:
        key - key of this container
        displayName - the display name of this container
        authorName - the full name of the author for this container
        authorEmail - the email of the author for this container
        hierarchy - the scope of this author container. Should be one of the USER_ values.
